subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Thome received a roaring ovation when he came up for the first time Friday. Holding “Welcome Thome” signs, fans were on their feet long before he left the dugout and walked to the plate.
snippet: Thome received a roaring ovation when he came up for the first time Friday. Holding “Welcome Thome” signs, fans were on their feet long before he left the dugout and walked to the plate.
